bibl.title: Alexander and the Hellenistic World.
bibl.seg: Welles C. Bradford, Alexander and the Hellenistic World.
Toronto, A.M. Hakkert, 1970, 8°, [xvi]-265 pp., 18 figg. et 3 cartes.

C.R. par Thomas W. Africa, CW 64 (1971) pp. 269-270. - E. Badian, Phoenix 25 (1971) pp. 176-177. - Eugene N. Borza, CP 67 (1972) pp. 308-310. - Truesdell S. Brown, AJP 94 (1973) pp. 112-116. - G. L. Cawkwell, CR N.S., 23 (1973) p. 103. - H. Leclercq, Nova et Vetera 49 (1971-1972) No. 4, p. 303. - Joseph Modrzejewski, RD 4e s., 49 (1971) pp. 110-112. - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 45 (1970) No. 90, pp. 401-403. - Kurt Treu, ArchPF 22-23 (1974) pp. 305-306. - Édouard Will, REG 85 (1972) p. 218.
